root: ^Zuri: Hey, heard you were the place to go to get the new paint everyone's got on. I'm not one to miss out on a hot new trend.

Paint: ^Zuri: I've also got some screws loose, been a minute since I've been repaired, so two birds with one stone, really.
Neo: ^Zuri: Not exactly. Haven't really protested, haven't been "fighting" like everyone else seems to be. But I am a neohuman, right? Figure I'm entitled to the look, at least.
Last: ^Zuri enters the room looking much better than last time.
